name: Duet Fire Dots
description:
Let's play new Addictive arcade game for all ages. It's amazing unique and interesting game.

How to Play?
=========
- you need to focus on fire dots.
- Touch left and right side and move the fire dots.
- Avoid all obstacles.

Features:
=======
- Endless game play.
- Challenge your friends.
- Colourful game play.
- Mind relax game.
- Supported IOS11.

So are you ready for play. Download Now...
